messages.message: Missing KTXwriter metadata. When KTXwriterScParams is present KTXwriter must also be present.
messages.details: KTXwriter metadata is missing. When KTXwriterScParams is present KTXwriter must also be present.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
